Text: It's been a while since I've done an on-site survey.
Please don't get too excited. Whenever you do—
Okay, I'm gonna see it all! Ooof—!

When falling face first...it's common sense to break
the fall with your hands. Your nose...is bleeding.

No worries, I always carry a handkerchief with me.
Let's tour the site!
Even so, everyone is focused on picking tea leaves.

We're just in time for harvesting season. Let's watch
them from afar...
Ah, a telescope...perfectly prepared.
"Always be prepared" they say. Now, let's see...

Hmph...I can see the outlines of everyone's
underwear, clear as day. All the way to
their stomachs!
There is no need to share such details...
Such details are proof of why we need to take action.
We've learned enough. Let's just leave it there...
You're right. Let's see what else is going on.
(Okay...okay...)
She's sure working hard.

Please focus on their clothes and not on their
work ethics.

My, this is an occupational disease. Oh... I can see
outlines on her as well. My, how embarrassing.

I don't think it's a concern between women, but if
they become consciously aware of it...

Using a telescope to observe them... Is this okay?
Do I look suspicious?
Honestly, you're this close to being arrested.
If I get caught, you'd better help me.

No need to speak of this hypothetically. OK,
let's look at some other people.
Yo, ha! La la la! Yo, ha!
That therianthrope girl must also...huh?
Something wrong?
There are no outlines of her underwear.
Perhaps therianthropes don't wear any?
That's rather rude to assume...

But if she's wearing them, shouldn't there be
an outline?

Could her underwear be made of thin materials?
She doesn't seem to be wearing loose clothes.
I don't know. And that is why I wish to ask.
You, young therianthrope, do you have a moment?

With her natural ability to communicate, she speaks
without hesitation... That is what I respect about
Lady Gamma...
Oh, you mean me?
Yes, you! Ack!!
Ah.
Uh, are you okay?

*Huff, huff*...I'm fine...But more importantly...what
kind of underwear...are you wearing...*huff, huff*
Lady Gamma, how could you be so crude?!
Are you really asking that...?
Gamma provides the details of her situation.

Huh, so that's why you want to know about my
underwear...?

Exactly, it's for the future of female kind!
I'm aware that it's a delicate subject, but
I must know!

It's nothing crazy, I just cut off the fabric of my
underwear, like this.

The therianthrope draws a picture of her underwear on
the ground. She'd removed the fabric from the area
which covers the butt.
So, you just minimize the fabric.

I'm worried about getting it caught while working,
or slipping while doing intense work.
I see, so that's why there are no lines. Is it...chilly?
I never noticed the lines weren't showing anymore.

I see...so instead of hiding the lines, you made it
fit the body... Hmm!

Yes, and now I can see how this is a business
opportunity!
Um...will that be all? I gotta get back to work.
Yes, thank you so much. Thanks to you, I get it now.
I'm thankful too. Now I can see the full picture.

It's function pushed to its ultimate limit. This
will be another form of art...

Functional beauty! With this approach, we can
combine design and practical use!
Yes! This is it!
We found our hint, Lady Gamma.

All right! Nu, let's go home! Let us gather our
workers and start development!
